data.title: Royal Oak and Troy, MI Funeral Home & Cremation
data.meta_description: A.J. Desmond & Sons Funeral Directors in Royal Oak and Troy, MI provides funeral, memorial, aftercare, pre-planning, and cremation... Learn More
data.text:
Alan Wolfelt, Ph.D,

will be presenting on

Wednesday, October 16, 2024, 6:30-8:30pm

and

Thursday, October 17, 2024, 9:00am-12:00pm

For more information, visit Upcoming Events

At A.J. Desmond & Sons Funeral Directors, we know a death is a difficult time. Rest assured we will take excellent care of you and your family. Know that we will always be compassionate and sensitive to families' needs, offer complete assistance before, during and after the services, and accept the responsibility entrusted to us with the highest level of integrity and respect. We are centrally located in Oakland County with the ability to serve communities throughout Oakland, Macomb, and Wayne counties including Royal Oak, Troy, Bloomfield Hills, Birmingham, Berkley, Beverly Hills, Bingham Farms, Clawson, Detroit, Ferndale, Franklin, Huntington Woods, Madison Heights, Oak Park, Pleasant Ridge, Pontiac, Rochester, Rochester Hills, Southfield, Sterling Heights and West Bloomfield.
